pagetitle: Language Learning Website - Learn Russian & French
description: Linguami is a multilingual language learning website for learning Russian and French. Discover a wide variety of video, audio, and text materials to study both languages effectively.
title: much more than a language site
subtitle: Learn a modern language spoken by native speakers. Discover a culture and join a community based on mutual aid and friendship between peoples
subtitleMobile: Learn a modern language spoken by native speakers.
videosubtitle: Movie clips, trailers, music videos - learn while having fun
audiosubtitle: Dialogues, audiobooks, podcasts - work on your listening comprehension wherever you are
textsubtitle: Myths, legends, culture - improve your level while traveling
dictionarysubtitle: Keep all your words in a personal dictionary
flashcardssubtitle: Review your vocabulary with our flashcard system
translatorsubtitle: Sign up and translate any word from any text
teachersubtitle: Take remote classes with a certified teacher and benefit from personalized learning
giftranslatorsubtitle: Thanks to our translation tool, translate any word and add it to your personal dictionary
gifflashcardssubtitle: Easily remember words added to your dictionary with our review tool
